revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.

General - I've just noted the corrigenda from the edition, which surmount some of the corrections noted below.
General - I've just noted the corrigenda from the edition, which surmount some of the corrections noted below.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: l. 4 >> ζω διὰ ε̣[.?]; l. 10 >> ὅλην; add horizontal line after l. 11; in l. 12 it’s probably (Ἰη(σοῦς)); l. 13 remove space before αν. META: bibio 369 should be 44301 #33 pp. 387-388image link is (https://luna.manchester.ac.uk/luna/servlet/detail/ManchesterDev~93~3~55544~223273:Apocryphal-Gospel--?-?sort=reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number&qvq=w4s:/what%2FChristianity;sort:reference_number%2Cimage_sequence_number%2Cimage_title%2Cimage_number;lc:ManchesterDev~93~3&mi=29&trs=52); update title to ‘fragment of an astronomical treatise’;
